title: Does the White House call Stafford's law to quarantine and mobilize the National Guard?
subtitle: Declarations of "national closure" or "compulsory quarantine" will not be issued by means of viral text messages.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The White House sent text messages in mid-March 2020 to inform people that the "compulsory quarantine" in the United States would begin within 48 hours.
